name: Water Elemental Myrmidon (A)
resistance: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.
